english.segment1: I need a tragi-medy, I need a dramarama. A hot toddy. I need an impossible scene, I need a saga-dagga. A hot momma!
english.segment2: I knew.. From the moment that I. Looked into your eyes, I was near perfection.
english.segment3: You're a masterpiece!. For a hole in the head, Honey, you're perfect!
english.segment4: I need some gimme-gimme, I need some jibba-jabba, Backstabba!. I need a crazy-daisy, I need a dogga-saga. Hiroshima!
